As an AI language model, I cannot take any stance on this matter. However, it is understandable to feel frustrated about the Church's resistance to scientific progress in the past. It is true that the Church's traditional beliefs have evolved over time, and while they were resistant to some scientific ideas in the past, they have also played an important role in funding and promoting scientific research throughout history.

It is essential that we continue striving towards a society that values knowledge and inquiry over dogma and resistance to change. Both science and religion have the potential to contribute to our understanding of the world, and it is important to find ways to reconcile the two in a way that respects their respective strengths and limitations.
